lines.text: Unless it's somewhere really inappropriate that I don't really want to go looking in, I think you're fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll have Yasha tell me later if she sees anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man, that makes me so happy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One date's great, but like, you need to keep going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wasn't expecting a little relationship advice in the middle of this conversation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I really shouldn't give it. I'm just so excited.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, you give great advice, genuinely.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rip the bandaid off, and do what we have to do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I am not, but there's only so much procrastinating we can do, and we're running out of time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you wire-- can you do the wire?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just in case he figured out where we are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, he's going to be bearing down on us the moment the wire is tripped, but I can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At least we'll wake up as opposed to last time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, we'll make it ring the bell, sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go sleep and have a good breakfast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there anything anybody would like to do before you go to bed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, you're probably going to go outside too.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I kind of want to-- can I go pick a flower out there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because not all of them have names.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a lot of instructions for picking a flower.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll go for a little bit, I'll be back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not going into the scary part of the woods but just walking around the grounds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So get all your stuff out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, it does feel like it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just putting it on the list.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two of you walk out into the now pouring rain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's stupid. That's dumb. Let's just--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like on the deck of a ship, because--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I promised her I would, that I would turn around and come back if things got bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because who knows, we might come back, you know?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: you know, I got to see my mama and my papa together and it was pretty great and they seem happy and it just had me thinking that you never got to talk to Vandran.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All the more reason to come home.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it wasn't quite that, but you know, I saw his eyes when he saw her for the first time and that was pretty great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He seems very nervous around her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he has a lot to-- He's got a lot to account for.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you want me to send a message to Vandran?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want me to scry on him? So you can at least know?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, because I'm going to see him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would never want to ruin that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to destroy a god city!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to tear it apart and float through the Astral Sea!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then find a way to come back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then we're going to see Vandran!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can hold my hand now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you said you had something you wanted to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do. My shit's by myself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go through the rain down to the edge to where it's safe and I'm going to put up the dome for myself and once it's up-- it takes a little bit-- I'm going to lay out a long stretch of leather in front of me and bring out Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then we added more and it turned into nein.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You and me, we'll keep people together instead of letting families break apart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So one way or another, you'll be free soon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I don't want anyone to be alarmed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make your way back to the rest of the group.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I'd like to see if I can try to find a flower that seems kind?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And just not-- that is open for the taking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception or nature check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it seems welcoming as a flower could.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know what I'm supposed to do, but please, please walk with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The blade looks damp and cold.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to eat the whole flower.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because it's what Caduceus did and I'm trying to make some type of connection here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a constitution saving throw for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You stand, instinctually, reaching for the blade that you set before you, but it's not there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll just start running towards it just as fast as I can go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Show me." And that's where we'll pick up next week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh jeez louise! Just right there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got a week to think about what you're going to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you don't have a sword?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wanted everyone to get high and find their god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I said not to eat the plants, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some of them are really weird!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, you had said it and I feel like for Yasha, she'd be like--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: "Oh, that's how you connect to a god."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give it to Yasha, she'll eat anything!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A bunch of smaller Yashas start jumping out of her back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, she's tried everything at this point to try to make the connection.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Orphan Maker doesn't need a sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's probably going to be a rough morning.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, it's going to be a rough morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Could be a rough evening, we just started.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is Kord the deity of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of strength, of contest, of storms and all manner of things in that space.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll pick up from there next week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And is it Thursday yet? Good night.
